VII.i.4.B.2.c
.
Income Considerations for Additional Family Members
If $185 is added to the conclusive dependency income limit for an additional member of the family,
consider any income of the family member that is available to the parent for support of the family member, and
do
not
consider the family memberâ€™s net worth unless it is actually available to the parent.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Establishing Parental Dependency
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
